5.eng-name: The Book of Mosques and Places of Prayer

hadiths.text: Abu Huraira reported:The Apostle of Allah (ﷺ) said: O Allah! I seek refuge with Thee from the torment of the grave, and the torment of Hell, and the trial of life and death and the mischief of Masih al-Dajjal

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يُسْتَعَاذُ مِنْهُ فِي الصَّلاَةِ
chapter.eng-name: From what refuge is to be sought when in salat
